title: ninjabotmaker
author: ninjabotmaker
content: Hello guys I want some TRX coins worth $5 can you please help me? Please hit me up as I will be online. I also have USDT $400 do let me know if you need it. I can accept Paypal money for it.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: If you have $400 worth of USDT, why don't you exchange some for it for the $5 worth TRX you need?I could help exchange the USDT but I don't have paypal right now. Good luck.

comments.author: ninjabotmaker
comments.body: I dont have enough TRX to do the transaction bro as $400 USDT is stuck in Trust Wallet

comments.author: celiosevii
comments.body: beware, these random wallets with lots of trx usdt are scam wallets with multisig, that means without the signature you cannot withdraw anything and your deposits are gone forever

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: ninjabotmaker on May 23, 2023, 06:37:13 AMI dont have enough TRX to do the transaction bro as $400 USDT is stuck in Trust WalletAre you sure you legitimately acquired the USDT?If someone "gifted" or sent you private keys of a wallet containing the USDT out of no where then be careful. Once you send the TRX to transfer the USDT out of the wallet. The TRX will be stolen and won't even be able to move out the USDT.

comments.author: ninjabotmaker
comments.body: Yes bro am 100% sure its real as its my affiliate money I got and the app am using is downloaded from IOS app store directly and its called Trust Wallet which is a part of binance

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: ninjabotmaker on May 24, 2023, 02:59:42 PMYes bro am 100% sure its real as its my affiliate money I got and the app am using is downloaded from IOS app store directly and its called Trust Wallet which is a part of binanceI would really love to help out, but I don't know how to go about this whole situation. Had you had a little bit of reputation here or a good enough activity. I would have sent you the TRX without having any doubts that you would refund it.

comments.author: davide72
comments.body: Quote from: ninjabotmaker on May 22, 2023, 09:26:32 PMHello guys I want some TRX coins worth $5 can you please help me? Please hit me up as I will be online. I also have USDT $400 do let me know if you need it. I can accept Paypal money for it.if you have paypal why don't you use it to buy 5 dollars of trx do you have any credit card?, everything seems simpler to me and you don't have to work hard to ask around

comments.author: ninjabotmaker
comments.body: Quote from: davide72 on May 29, 2023, 10:45:06 PMQuote from: ninjabotmaker on May 22, 2023, 09:26:32 PMHello guys I want some TRX coins worth $5 can you please help me? Please hit me up as I will be online. I also have USDT $400 do let me know if you need it. I can accept Paypal money for it.if you have paypal why don't you use it to buy 5 dollars of trx do you have any credit card?, everything seems simpler to me and you don't have to work hard to ask aroundYes I do have verified paypal for my business and yes I do have money in it. Can you tell me which website to use to buy TRX with paypal or my credit card?

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: ninjabotmaker on July 02, 2023, 03:27:37 PMYes I do have verified paypal for my business and yes I do have money in it. Can you tell me which website to use to buy TRX with paypal or my credit card?Use centralized exchanges since you're going to your credit card, that's the easiest way where you can buy TRX as you need it. The exchange that's commonly suggested on this one is Binance:(https://www.binance.com/en/blog/fiat/can-you-buy-cryptocurrency-with-a-credit-card-421499824684903691)Also, you can do that with Trustwallet.https://trustwallet.com/buy-tron/
